comments:
Using 3.0 M6 selecting "Delete Completed Tasks" from the Task View throws an 
uncaught NPE.

I have trakcked the problem down to 
org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.ActionDeleteCompleted.  The constructor 
needs to set the part field.

While testing the fix, i found when marking a user editable task as complete 
(by clicking on the checkbox) it does not get picked up by the action, but as 
soon as you add a new task pre-set to complete, the action works properly and 
picks up the previously missed tasks.

Can you annotate this PR with the following information:
- the call stack of the NPE you got (see the .log file in 
<workspace>/.metadata/.log)
- the version of 3.0 that you are using (M6, I20040113, etc.)

Thanks for investigating this so thoroughly.

as per comment 0, 3.0 M6 (200312182000) :)
